name: Pizza Party
description:
Pizza Party - is a game with interesting pizza making mechanics. Have time to prepare pizza on time so that the client does not get angry.
Don't make people wait, they don't like it. The quicker you make the pizza, the happier they will be, and you might get the teapots.

A game against the clock, you need to cook pizza as quickly as possible so as not to keep the client waiting.

The game has:

- Pleasant music
- Cute graphics
- Pizza
- 10 difficulty levels

The game will help pass the time well, good luck and a fun game!
